author: Ali Gostanian and Caitlin Fichtel and Osej Serratos
title: 'Like sitting ducks': Amid coronavirus, families, attorneys sound alarm over ICE detainees
description: Families and attorneys are urging the government to release ICE detainees during the COVID-19 outbreak as they worry over their health and safety.
content:
Americans with family members in immigration detention facilities, as well as their lawyers, are sounding the alarm and urging the release of nonviolent detainees with underlying health conditions amid the COVID-19 pandemic.
